author: FotMob
title: Portugal 2-1 Croatia: Ronaldo's 900th goal seals Nations League win
text: Cristiano Ronaldo's 900th career goal proved the winner as Portugal saw off Croatia 2-1 in the Nations League. Cristiano Ronaldo scored his 900th career goal as Portugal edged Croatia 2-1 in Thursday's Nations League clash at Estadio da Luz. Ronaldo's 34th-minute goal proved the winner, as the Portugal captain turned in Nuno Mendes' cross for his milestone goal. Roberto Martinez's side led inside seven minutes through Diogo Dalot, and 39-year-old Ronaldo forced a brilliant reflex save out of Dominik Livakovic 15 minutes later. Livakovic was helpless to prevent Ronaldo putting Portugal ahead, though Dalot's own goal four minutes before half-time set up an exciting second period in the League A Group 1 contest. Yet despite shading the expected goals (xG) value in the second half, with 0.44 to Portugal's 0.36, Croatia found no way through, with Ronaldo going off to a standing ovation when he was substituted late on. Portugal, the 2019 Nations League winners, will remain in Lisbon to welcome Scotland on Sunday while Zlatko Dalic's Croatia side will look to bounce back against Poland in Osijek on the second matchday. Data Debrief: Nine hundred not out Ronaldo was already the top scorer in the history of the game, and international football's record goalscorer added another to his remarkable tally to hit the 900 mark. It was his 131st for his country, on a night he had a joint team-high four shots, along with Bruno Fernandes. The rest of his goals have been split across his clubs: 450 for Real Madrid, 145 for Manchester United, 131 at Juventus, 68 for Al-Nassr, and five when he played for Sporting CP at the start of his career.

author: Francisco, Marhuenda
title: La humillación del PSOE en Navarra
text:
Sin Perdón
La humillación del PSOE en Navarra
«La inacción, como sucede en el PSOE, conduce a que un líder concentre todo el poder»
No hay duda de que llegar a final de mes es duro. Los dirigentes del PSOE en Navarra se han humillado al entregar Pamplona a Bildu. Lo han hecho con absoluta sumisión al inquilino de La Moncloa, porque se juegan mucho. No se pueden arriesgar a quedarse sin trabajo. Es una consecuencia del sistema partitocrático, porque ganan más en política que dedicándose a sus profesiones. No hay más que ver a Ramón Alzórriz que era técnico administrativo, una profesión muy respetable, pero peor retribuida y con menos proyección que ser diputado autonómico y secretario de Organización del PSN-PSOE. Es un ejemplo de una realidad que se extiende por los partidos y que, en algunos, como en el PSOE, resulta inquietante. La carrera política en Roma se basaba en el «cursus honorum», donde eran importantes el mérito y la capacidad. En el PSOE se reduce a la fidelidad al líder, la aceptación del populismo sanchista y la sumisión al aparato del partido. En caso contrario, no cabe otro camino que el ostracismo. Esto explica que los socialistas navarros hayan entregado Pamplona a los herederos de ETA.
No hay que sorprenderse, porque sucede lo mismo con la inconstitucional amnistía. Es cierto que Conde-Pumpido hará un zafio pumpidazo para blanquearla, pero pasará a la Historia como el jurista del régimen sanchista. Es una lástima que no tenga presente lo que sufrió García-Pelayo, que era un gran jurista, cuando se equivocó sometiéndose al felipismo en la sentencia de Rumasa. Por ello, abandonó la presidencia del TC y regresó a Venezuela arrepentido por el error que había cometido. Las democracias pueden evolucionar al autoritarismo democrático, que podría parecer un contrasentido, pero no lo es. Tocqueville utilizó el término «despotismo democrático» en su obra la «La democracia en América» para advertir de los riesgos que amenazan a las democracias. La inacción, como sucede en el PSOE, conduce a que un líder concentre todo el poder, se rodee de un grupo de fieles y el resto del partido asuma las mentiras como verdades o cambios de opinión. Con ello, se entierra el socialismo y se da paso al sanchismo.
Francisco Marhuendaes catedrático de Derecho Público e Historia de las Instituciones (UNIE)

author: Sponsored
title: Ranking the Top 7 Best Testosterone Boosters for Men Over 40
text:

 Alpha Tonic Reviews (2024 Update)
Our Criteria To Rank The Best Testosterone Boosting Supplements
In our quest to rank the most effective testosterone boosters available in the market, we employed a rigorous and systematic review process, ensuring that our recommendations stand on the bedrock of credibility and efficacy.
Recognizing the myriad options and the varied needs of individuals facing low testosterone, we focused on eight crucial factors, ensuring that each testosterone supplement we recommend meets the highest quality, safety, and effectiveness standards.
Ingredient Transparency and Purity
Foremost, we scrutinized the ingredient list of testosterone boosters. We demanded full transparency and ensured each supplement contained high-quality, natural ingredients with no hidden fillers or harmful additives. The purity of these nutritional supplements is paramount in our assessment, as it directly impacts their safety and effectiveness.
Clinically Backed Ingredients
Each testosterone-boosting supplement was evaluated based on the presence of clinically backed ingredients. We delved into scientific studies and research, confirming that the constituents in these testosterone boosters are not only safe but also proven to address symptoms of low testosterone effectively.
Dosage Efficacy Of Testosterone Boosting Supplements
Composition information, no doubt, is crucial. However, the efficacy of testosterone boosters hinges on their ingredient dosage. We meticulously analyzed whether these testosterone supplements contain adequate quantities of key ingredients, ensuring they align with the dosages validated by scientific research.
Safety and Side Effect Profile
Safety is non-negotiable. Our systematic review included an in-depth analysis of each testosterone booster’s side effect profile. We prioritized testosterone-boosting supplements that offer the benefits of elevating T levels without exposing users to undue risks.
User Testimonials and Reviews
Testimonials and reviews offer invaluable insights into the real-world effectiveness of testosterone boosters. We sifted through countless user experiences, giving weight to testosterone supplements that have consistently received positive feedback for delivering tangible improvements in testosterone levels, energy, and overall well-being.
Manufacturing Standards
The manufacturing environment and practices play a critical role in the quality of testosterone boosters. We ensured that each testosterone-boosting supplement on our list was produced in facilities that adhered to stringent quality control standards, such as GMP (Good Manufacturing Practices) certifications.
Brand Reputation and Transparency
The reputation and transparency of the brand behind each testosterone booster were meticulously evaluated. We favored brands that maintain an open dialogue with their customers, offering clear and accessible information about their products, manufacturing processes, and customer support.
Value and Cost-Efficiency
Lastly, we assessed the value proposition of top testosterone boosters, considering their price relative to their benefits. Our selected testosterone-boosting supplements not only promise but also deliver optimal results, making them a worthwhile investment for individuals dealing with low testosterone.
By adhering to these stringent criteria, our ranking represents the pinnacle of testosterone boosters, offering you a reliable guide to selecting a supplement that genuinely supports your journey to restored vitality and health.
What Is Testosterone?
Testosterone is a pivotal hormone primarily produced by male testicles. The male body naturally produces testosterone. It’s crucial for male sexual development, playing a pivotal role in the development of male reproductive tissues, including the prostate and testes.
Testosterone fosters secondary sexual characteristics such as increased muscle and bone mass and body hair growth. Beyond its physical attributes, it significantly influences libido, energy, mood, and cognitive functions. As men age, T levels naturally decline, often leading to a need for dietary and lifestyle adjustments or supplementation to maintain optimal health and well-being.
What Can Lower Testosterone Levels?
Various factors can contribute to lowered testosterone levels, often leading to a condition known as hypogonadism or low testosterone. Age is a primary factor; as men age, a natural decline in T production occurs. However, other elements can also significantly impact T levels, affecting the testicles, pituitary gland, and thyroid.
Lifestyle choices play a crucial role; poor diet, lack of physical activity, excessive alcohol intake, and smoking can all negatively affect T production. Stress is another critical factor, with chronic stress and inadequate sleep leading to elevated cortisol levels, which in turn can lower testosterone levels and cause problems like erectile dysfunction and poor libido.
Certain medical conditions, such as obesity, diabetes, and hormonal disorders, can also lower testosterone hormone. Additionally, exposure to endocrine disruptors in some plastics and personal care products can interfere with hormone production.
Understanding these factors is essential for taking proactive steps to maintain healthy testosterone levels and overall well-being.
Can Testosterone Boosters Help?
Testosterone boosters can be beneficial for individuals experiencing low testosterone levels, offering a potential avenue to improve symptoms related to testosterone deficiency.
Natural testosterone boosters work with the help of organic ingredients known to support the body’s T production, such as vitamins, minerals, and herbal extracts. While they can work by elevating energy production, enhancing muscle mass, improving libido, and boosting overall well-being, it’s essential to approach them with realistic expectations.
Are Testosterone Boosters Safe?
Yes. T boosters are primarily safe for increasing testosterone in the male body. Though most of the testosterone-boosting supplements’ composition is not tested in any third-party laboratory, they have compounds that are clinically proven. Also, the best testosterone supplements above are made in an FDA-approved and GMP-certified facility, ensuring their safety and potency.
The Science Behind Testosterone Boosters
Top T boosters claim to increase testosterone in the male body. But how? This is because of their composition of natural ingredients and plant extracts. Here are some of the common ingredients found in natural testosterone boosters:
D-aspartic Acid
D-aspartic acid is a natural amino acid that plays a crucial role in the synthesis and release of testosterone. It stimulates the release of luteinizing hormone, influencing the testes to produce more testosterone.
Studies have suggested that d-aspartic acid supplementation can lead to a temporary increase in testosterone levels, which is particularly beneficial for those with low levels or athletes seeking performance enhancement. However, the effects of d-aspartic acid seem to be more pronounced in individuals with low testosterone, and continued research is needed to understand its impact fully.
Vitamin D
Vitamin D often hailed as the “sunshine vitamin,” is increasingly recognized for its role in T production. This fat-soluble vitamin acts as a steroid hormone, influencing bone health, immune function, and cell growth.
While direct vitamin D supplementation may not drastically boost testosterone levels, maintaining adequate vitamin D status is essential for overall health and can support optimal hormonal balance.
Horny Goat Weed
Horny Goat Weed is a traditional Chinese herb renowned for its aphrodisiac properties and its potential to aid in enhancing sexual function. While scientific research on its direct effect on T levels is limited, it’s believed to contribute to overall sexual well-being.
Tribulus Terrestris
Tribulus Terrestris is a plant commonly used in traditional medicine to enhance sexual function and increase muscle mass. While Tribulus Terrestris is popularly included in testosterone boosters, scientific evidence supporting its ability to increase testosterone levels significantly is mixed.
Some studies suggest Tribulus Terrestris may improve sexual health and enhance libido by increasing the release of nitric oxide, thereby improving blood flow rather than directly influencing testosterone levels.
Zinc
Zinc is essential for multiple bodily functions, including immune response, DNA synthesis, and cellular metabolism. Zinc plays a vital role in T production.
Zinc supplementation is required for the activity of enzymes that convert cholesterol into testosterone, and a zinc deficiency can lead to low testosterone levels.
Zinc supplementation can be beneficial, particularly for those with a deficiency, leading to a potential improvement in testosterone levels and overall reproductive health.
Panax Ginseng
Panax Ginseng, often called Korean Ginseng, is a well-known adaptogen used for centuries in traditional medicine. It’s believed to help the body resist stress and enhance physical and mental performance.
While research on its direct impact on T levels is limited, Panax Ginseng may contribute to improved reproductive function and increased energy production. Its active compounds, ginsenosides, are thought to support nitric oxide production, enhancing blood flow and potentially improving erectile function.
What Are The Symptoms of Low Testosterone?
Symptoms of low testosterone can manifest in various physical and emotional changes. Men with less testosterone may experience hair loss on the scalp and body. Reduced libido, erectile dysfunction, and decreased semen volume are common reproductive symptoms.
Fatigue, loss of muscle mass, increased fat, and reduced bone density signal changes in physical strength and body composition. Mood swings, irritability, depression, and difficulty concentrating are also indicative of low testosterone.
These symptoms can significantly impact the quality of life, making awareness and proper management of testosterone levels crucial for overall well-being.
What Is Testosterone Therapy?
Testosterone therapy, also known as testosterone replacement therapy (TRT), is a medical treatment designed to elevate testosterone levels in individuals diagnosed with low testosterone or hypogonadism.
The medical treatment involves administering testosterone through injections, patches, gels, or pellets, aiming to restore hormone levels to a normal range. The goal of testosterone replacement therapy is to alleviate symptoms associated with low testosterone, such as decreased libido, fatigue, loss of muscle mass, and mood changes.
What Are The Adverse Effects Of Testosterone Replacement Therapy?
Testosterone replacement therapy (TRT) can have adverse effects, including increased risk of cardiovascular issues like heart attacks and strokes, especially in older men.
It may contribute to sleep apnea, provoke skin conditions like acne and oily skin, stimulate prostate growth, cause high blood pressure, and potentially increase the risk of prostate cancer.
Testosterone therapy can also lead to decreased sperm production, testicular shrinkage, and enlarged breasts. It’s crucial for individuals considering Testosterone therapy to discuss these risks with their healthcare provider.
What Is The Best Method of Testosterone Testing?
The best method for testosterone testing is through blood tests, as they provide the most accurate and reliable measurement of hormone levels. Blood tests can precisely measure total and free testosterone, offering a comprehensive understanding of an individual’s hormonal status. Conducting these blood tests in the morning when testosterone levels are typically at their highest, ensuring the most precise results for informed health assessments and decisions is recommended.
How To Increase Testosterone Levels?
Adopting a balanced diet rich in lean proteins, healthy fats, and whole grains is crucial to naturally increasing testosterone levels. A balanced diet ensures a steady supply of essential nutrients and vitamins that support hormonal health.
Regular physical activity boosts testosterone production, particularly strength training and high-intensity interval workouts. Reducing alcohol intake is essential, as excessive consumption can negatively impact hormone balance. Managing stress through mindfulness or yoga can lower cortisol levels, promoting healthier testosterone levels.
Additionally, ensuring adequate sleep each night is vital, as poor sleep patterns can significantly hinder T production.
Final Words on The Most Effective Testosterone Boosters In 2024
In conclusion, navigating the complex world of
 testosterone boosters can be overwhelming. Still, armed with the correct information and a discerning eye, you can make choices that significantly enhance your well-being.
While natural supplements like TestoPrime, Testogen, and Alpha Tonic offer promising benefits, they should complement a healthy lifestyle, not replace it.
We encourage you to approach these supplements with a balanced diet, regular exercise, and mindful stress management for optimal results. Embrace these natural aids to reclaim your vitality and stride confidently into a healthier, more vibrant life.

title: 守护"一老一小"食品安全|市场监管局_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
本报南宁讯（邱碧英 记者顾艳伟）4月15日，广西壮族自治区梧州市市场监管局走进南中社区，开展“守护‘一老一小’食品安全筑牢防诈反骗安全屏障”主题普法宣传活动，为200余名社区居民送上“食品安全+反诈防骗”安全课，有效提升老年群体依法维权能力。
　　活动现场，执法人员通过实物对比展示，生动讲解保健食品“蓝帽子”标识特征，针对老年群体关注的“降压降糖”“增强免疫”等功效，重点科普“保健食品非药品”的科学认知。“原来包装盒上有这个蓝色标识的才是‘正规军’。”居民王阿姨举着样品说。
　　在当天的科普讲座上，梧州市市场监管局特食科精心制作的养老诈骗案例短片引发居民强烈共鸣。视频还原“免费体检”“专家义诊”“亲情营销”等类典型骗术，宣讲人员同步解读“三不”防诈口诀——不轻信宣传话术、不透露个人信息、不转账支付钱款。
　　“这些案例都是我们身边发生过的真实事件。”社区工作者刘专员表示，情景再现方式让老年人更易识破“包治百病”“特效神药”等话术陷阱。
　　活动现场设立了“维权加油站”，公示12315、12345等投诉渠道，指导居民留存微信支付记录、购物小票等关键证据。宣讲人员结合《食品安全法》有关条款，通过维权成功案例解析，鼓励老年群体依法维护自己的权益。
　　梧州市市场监管局相关负责人表示，此次活动实现了知识普及与技能提升的双重目标。该局将深化“宣传+监管”长效机制，联合公安部门开展专项整治行动，同步开通老年消费维权 【下载黑猫投诉客户端】 绿色通道，通过短视频普法等载体构建全域宣传网络，切实守护老年群体“舌尖安全”与“钱袋平安”。

author: Negin Hashemi
title: IDTechEx Unpacks the Electrification of CAM Machines
text:
The battery market for electric construction, agriculture, and mining (CAM) machines is expected to reach US$8 billion by 2034. Electric CAM machines promise health, environmental, and productivity benefits, while also acting as long-term financial investments for companies. These machines come in a number of shapes, sizes, and weights, and require a wide variety of batteries to suit their many functions. IDTechEx’s latest report, “ Battery Markets in Construction, Agriculture & Mining Machines 2024-2034 ”, explores options for different battery chemistries in accordance with the requirements of various machines.
The ‘whys’ behind the rise of electrification
Local air quality improvements, lowered greenhouse gas emissions, safer work environments, and less pollutants are all advantages of CAM machine electrification. Despite these machines carrying high initial costs, the reduced diesel and maintenance costs over time will make them a good investment within these industries. Additionally, operators can expect further benefits, such as faster system responses, improved control, and easier operation.
Excavators, loaders, and mini excavators make up around three-quarters of the construction machine market. However, the popularity and size of large excavators (>6 tonnes) specifically means they are huge emitters of greenhouse gases. IDTechEx reports that almost half of the total emissions from construction machines come from these alone. While mini excavators may be easier to electrify, making the larger ones electric still stands as a huge goal in the hope of greatly reducing emissions. Within the mining sector, the main vehicles set for electrification include dump trucks, haul trucks, and mining light vehicles, while tractors see the most electrification within the agriculture sector.
The installation of charging infrastructure on work sites, alongside the question of whether these machines will be able to complete a full day of work on one charge, are factors to be considered before making the leap from engine to electric. There is also limited push from governments to make these changes, meaning a lack of subsidies and support may make initial costs a bit too high.
Battery types and requirements for CAM machines
Power demands vary from machine to machine, meaning batteries won’t be a one-size-fits-all solution. Batteries need to be faster charging for CAM machines than everyday electric cars to minimize downtime and ensure they can complete their work promptly. Cells that can be charged quickly might ordinarily have reduced energy density, but with technologies including high silicon content anodes and solid-state electrolytes, higher energy density could be available alongside faster charging capabilities.
With data collected from over 200 electric CAM machines across different markets, IDTechEx provides suggestions for which battery types would be best suited to various machines, determined by how much energy per tonne per hour each machine uses. LFP and NMC chemistries are the main battery types currently in use as they have been popular within the automotive industry. According to IDTechEx’s latest batteries for CAM machines report , tractors are the most energy-intensive machines, using around 50% more energy per hour than most other CAM machines; as such, they require much larger batteries than something like a mining light vehicle.
New battery chemistries such as lithium titanate (LTO) could be a good option for ensuring fast charging doesn’t lead to faster wearing or decreased longevity. The introduction of new anode materials, such as LTO, could see an electric machine lasting more than 10,000 cycles on one battery, without replacement. By contrast, leading NMC and LFP technologies offer up to ~5,000 cycles before reaching their end of life. Having a 10,000+ cycle battery would mean huge cost and convenience advantages for companies employing them.
Solid-state batteries for increased safety
Solid electrolytes may improve the safety of a cell, which is critical for electric CAM machines, so solid-state batteries could be another promising future option. This could be a crucial development for machines working underground or indoors, such as underground loaders or mini excavators. Solid-state batteries could also provide an increased energy density so that machines can more comfortably fulfill their duty cycle demands. This battery chemistry, however, comes with challenges during the manufacturing process, such as ensuring high-quality electrolytes are thin enough, as well as maintaining a good connection between electrolytes and electrodes.
IDTechEx’s report covers 10 different future battery options for CAM machines, as well as exploring which chemistries are available in different regions. While Europe and North America most commonly use NMC, LFP is more common in China, with Europe and China predicted to see LTO batteries employed first. With the wide variety of weights, sizes, and use cases of CAM machines, LFP and NMC might no longer be the best options, with emerging technologies, including silicon anode, solid-state, and sodium-ion, predicted to be amongst the best. The report includes details on product offerings from over 40 different pack manufacturers and assemblers, and tables that benchmark products against different performance indicators.
For more information, please see the IDTechEx report, “ Battery Markets in Construction, Agriculture & Mining Machines 2024-2034 ”. Downloadable sample pages are available for this report.
For the full portfolio of electric vehicle market research available from IDTechEx, please visit www.IDTechEx.com/Research/EV .
About IDTechEx
IDTechEx provides trusted independent research on emerging technologies and their markets. Since 1999, we have been helping our clients to understand new technologies, their supply chains, market requirements, opportunities and forecasts. For more information, contact research@IDTechEx.com or visit www.IDTechEx.com .
